attributes.action: MP Standing on reading out  the  names of servicemen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would be a sign of respect if all MPs could stand in  silence  when the Prime Minster reads out the names of the dead serviceman

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
